# QuMovie

<strong>This project is a web application for movie lists.</strong>

</div>
<br>

## Feature

- Home <br>
  The first display that you see is a list of all existing movies.

- Dark and Light Mode <br>
  Click the Moon icon on navbar for change to dark mode. <br>
  Click the Sun icon on navbar for change to light mode.

- Add to Favourites <br>
  Click Add to Favourites for add movies to Favourites lists. <br>
  Click menu FAVOURITES on navbar to see your favourite movies lists.

- See Details <br>
  Click See Details too see movies details. <br>
  In Details can see:

  - Video trailer
  - Genre of movie
  - Release date and rating of movie
  - Overview of movie

- Upcoming <br>
  Click menu UPCOMING on navber to see lists of upcoming movies.

- Search Movie <br>
  Click input field on navbar and type title movie then enter to search movie.

- More Movie <br>
  Click More Movie button on bottom of page to load more movie lists.
  <br>
  <br>

## Deploy on Local

In the project directory, you can run:

### `npm start`

Runs the app in the development mode.\
Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) to view it in your browser.
